WorkItem.ClosedComment: Basically the same answer here. There isn't a specific bug here for us to fix - right now, loose files is the main answer outside the Web project template's build action

Almost a duplicate of workitem #422.  

In that workitem report (#422), RyanCavanaugh did mentioned "We'll be iterating heavily on the project system in Visual Studio in future releases - stay tuned."
